description:
Maeda-san, who works at Hanako’s home, fires lasers from his butt. This offers Kasumi with a unique perspective for her fan fiction.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kahanshin kara Beam / Mekuso Hanakuso / Fuhou Senkyo / Shiri Asobi
Lasers sous la ceinture / L`Hôpital qui se moque de la charité / Occupation illégale / Jeu de boule
Lower Body Lasers / Pots and Kettles / Illegal Occupation / Butt Play
下半身からビーム / 目クソ鼻クソ / 不法占拠 / 尻遊び
